III. DESCRIPTION OF FINDINGS
1.) The facility is in compliance with all applicable rules and statues.
2.) The facility is non-contracted and therefore not required to comply with MISEP
requirements.
3.) The facility is non-contracted and therefore not required to comply with MDHHS
Contract/Policy requirements.
IV. TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE
The facility did not require technical assistance during this review.
V. CONSULTATION
The facility did not request consultation during this review.
VI. EVALUATION OF RENEWAL PERIOD
There were no substantiated incidents of maltreatment in care during this licensing
period.
The facility was not required to submit any corrective action plans during this licensing
period.
VII. RECOMMENDATION
Based on inspection findings the facility is in compliance with all applicable licensing
statutes and rules. It is recommended that the facility be issued a renewal of their
regular license.
May 11, 2021
Heather Reilly Date
Licensing Consultant
